paper_abstract: A general digit-recurrence algorithm for the computation of the mth root (with an m integer) is presented in this paper. Based on the concept of completing the mth root, a detailed analysis of the convergence conditions is performed and iteration-independent digit-selection rules are obtained for any radix and redundant digit set. A radix-2 version for mth rooting is also studied, together with closed formulas for both the digit selection rules and the number of bits required to perform correct selections.
paper_title: A digit-by-digit algorithm for mth root extraction
